option.name: notice
option.value:
Copyright (c) $today.year /// Project SWG /// www.projectswg.com
ProjectSWG is an emulation project for Star Wars Galaxies founded on July 7th, 2011 after SOE announced the official shutdown of Star Wars Galaxies. Our goal is to create one or more emulators which will provide servers for players to continue playing a game similar to the one they used to play.
This file is part of PSWGCommon.
